### mayHaveInterruptDelaySlot() {#a6ff045f0b9355cbec9755e5ec738eba8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="static bool mayHaveInterruptDelaySlot (unsigned InstOpcode)"
  labels = {["static"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a> has certain instructions which enable interrupts exactly one instruction <em>after</em> the instruction which stores to SS.

Return true if the given instruction may have such an interrupt delay slot.

<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// X86 can reduce the bytes of NOP by padding instructions with prefixes to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// get a better peformance in some cases. Here, we determine which prefix is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the most suitable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If the instruction has a segment override prefix, use the existing one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If the target is 64-bit, use the CS.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If the target is 32-bit,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   - If the instruction has a ESP/EBP base register, use SS.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   - Otherwise use DS.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">uint8&#95;t X86AsmBackend::determinePaddingPrefix(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;Inst)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfragment">MCFragment</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> = CurrentFragment;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since data is always emitted into a DataFragment, our check strategy is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// simple here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - If the fragment is a DataFragment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     - If it&#39;s empty (section start or data after align), return false.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     - If it&#39;s not the fragment where the previous instruction is,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       returns true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     - If it&#39;s the fragment holding the previous instruction but its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       size changed since the previous instruction was emitted into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       it, returns true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     - Otherwise returns false.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - If the fragment is not a DataFragment, returns false.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Insert BoundaryAlignFragment before instructions to align branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86asmbackend-cpp-/x86asmbackend/#a38dcf42330d1efcd03d0686ba7bbaf1d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86asmbackend-cpp-/x86asmbackend/#a38dcf42330d1efcd03d0686ba7bbaf1d">X86AsmBackend::emitInstructionBegin</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectstreamer">MCObjectStreamer</a> &amp;OS,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Used by canPadInst. Done here, because in emitInstructionEnd, the current</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fragment will have changed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">  IsRightAfterData =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="#a3e3ecc5f07c46d1e37b8d7cff83982e6">isRightAfterData</a>(OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a2f9393965bc0de69da6236c623f79579">getCurrentFragment</a>(), PrevInstPosition);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!canPadBranches(OS))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NB: PrevInst only valid if canPadBranches is true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!isMacroFused(PrevInst, Inst))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Macro fusion doesn&#39;t happen indeed, clear the pending.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PendingBA = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When branch padding is enabled (basically the skx102 erratum =&gt; unlikely),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we call canPadInst (not cheap) twice. However, in the common case, we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// avoid unnecessary calls to that, as this is otherwise only used for</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PendingBA &amp;&amp; PendingBA-&gt;getNext() == OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a2f9393965bc0de69da6236c623f79579">getCurrentFragment</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Macro fusion actually happens and there is no other fragment inserted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// after the previous instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do nothing here since we already inserted a BoudaryAlign fragment when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we met the first instruction in the fused pair and we&#39;ll tie them</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// together in emitInstructionEnd.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: When there is at least one fragment, such as MCAlignFragment,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inserted after the previous instruction, e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cmp %rax %rcx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   .align 16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   je .Label0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// \\ endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We will treat the JCC as a unfused branch although it may be fused</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with the CMP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (needAlign(Inst) || ((AlignBranchType &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86/#a1fe75f600f6eea354189c898829a9465aee32f1149f4d72dc0e46c30ef99b842b">X86::AlignBranchFused</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="#a819849ddb360be005e7c78fad31f754d">isFirstMacroFusibleInst</a>(Inst, &#42;MCII))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we meet a unfused branch or the first instuction in a fusiable pair,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Set the last fragment to be aligned for the BoundaryAlignFragment.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f6182886dc2f96c204299e92c1565d5">dyn&#95;cast&#95;or&#95;null&lt;MCRelaxableFragment&gt;</a>(CF))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PrevInst is only needed if canPadBranches. Copying an MCInst isn&#39;t cheap.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!needAlign(Inst) || !PendingBA)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Tie the aligned instructions into a pending BoundaryAlign.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PendingBA-&gt;setLastFragment(CF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PendingBA = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to ensure that further data isn&#39;t added to the current</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See if we can further relax some instructions to cut down on the number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nop bytes required for code alignment.  The actual win is in reducing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction count, not number of bytes.  Modern X86-64 can easily end up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// decode limited.  It is often better to reduce the number of instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (i.e. eliminate nops) even at the cost of increasing the size and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// complexity of others.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/#ac5493f0a7c649b6d0ac023f19af7a6c3">X86PadForAlign</a> &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/#a43f30dd8395928416cc42cc0346dffb8">X86PadForBranchAlign</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The processed regions are delimitered by LabeledFragments. -g may have more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MCSymbols and therefore different relaxation results. X86PadForAlign is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// disabled by default to eliminate the -g vs non -g difference.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To keep the effects local, prefer to relax instructions closest to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the align directive.  This is purely about human understandability</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the resulting code.  If we later find a reason to expand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// particular instructions over others, we can adjust.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RemainingSize = OrigSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Relaxable.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>() &amp;&amp; RemainingSize != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;RF = &#42;Relaxable.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Give the backend a chance to play any tricks it wishes to increase</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the encoding size of the given instruction.  Target independent code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will try further relaxation, but target&#39;s may play further tricks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86asmbackend-cpp-/x86asmbackend/#a2fab033607162e6ab1a1d6fb7ed5e07b">padInstructionEncoding</a>(RF, Asm.getEmitter(), RemainingSize))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Sec.setHasLayout(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have an instruction which hasn&#39;t been fully relaxed, we can&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// skip past it and insert bytes before it.  Changing its starting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offset might require a larger negative offset than it can encode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We don&#39;t need to worry about larger positive offsets as none of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible offsets between this and our align are visible, and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ones afterwards aren&#39;t changing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86asmbackend-cpp-/x86asmbackend/#ae14243cebfb18dca997cdca22b151245">mayNeedRelaxation</a>(RF.getInst(), &#42;RF.getSubtargetInfo()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Relaxable.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#aac0ea55010b7b1a301e65a0baea057aa">clear</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t FinalOffset = Asm.getFragmentOffset(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint8&#95;t i = 0; i &lt; Prefixes; i++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OS &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&#39;\\x66&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t Rest = ThisNopLength - Prefixes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Rest != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a6e0cbc5c8568d8446c284c8538b2c9f1">write</a>(Nops&#91;Rest - 1&#93;, Rest);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> -= ThisNopLength;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> != 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Encode the registers in the order they were saved --- 3-bits per</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register. The list of saved registers is assumed to be in reverse</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order. The registers are numbered from 1 to CU&#95;NUM&#95;SAVED&#95;REGS.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t RegEnc = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, Idx = 0; i != CU&#95;NUM&#95;SAVED&#95;REGS; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = SavedRegs&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> == 0) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CURegNum = getCompactUnwindRegNum(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CURegNum == -1) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ~0<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea4c614360da93c0a041b22e537de151eb">U</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Encode the 3-bit register number in order, skipping over 3-bits for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// each register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RegEnc |= (CURegNum &amp; 0x7) &lt;&lt; (Idx++ &#42; 3);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((RegEnc &amp; 0x3FFFF) == RegEnc &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid compact register encoding!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegEnc;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create the permutation encoding used with frameless stacks. It is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// passed the number of registers to be saved and an array of the registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// saved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t encodeCompactUnwindRegistersWithoutFrame(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegCount)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The saved registers are numbered from 1 to 6 In order to encode the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order in which they were saved, we re-number them according to their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// place in the register order. The re-numbering is relative to the last</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// re-numbered register. E.g., if we have registers &#123;6, 2, 4, 5&#125; saved in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that order:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Orig  Re-Num</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    ----  ------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     6       6</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     2       2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     4       3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     5       3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; RegCount; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CUReg = getCompactUnwindRegNum(SavedRegs&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1263"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CUReg == -1) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ~0<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea4c614360da93c0a041b22e537de151eb">U</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SavedRegs&#91;i&#93; = CUReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1267"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reverse the list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1268"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::reverse(&amp;SavedRegs&#91;0&#93;, &amp;SavedRegs&#91;CU&#95;NUM&#95;SAVED&#95;REGS&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1269"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t RenumRegs&#91;CU&#95;NUM&#95;SAVED&#95;REGS&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = CU&#95;NUM&#95;SAVED&#95;REGS - RegCount; i &lt; CU&#95;NUM&#95;SAVED&#95;REGS; ++i)&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1272"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Countless = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1273"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j = CU&#95;NUM&#95;SAVED&#95;REGS - RegCount; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a> &lt; i; ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1274"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SavedRegs&#91;j&#93; &lt; SavedRegs&#91;i&#93;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1275"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ++Countless;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1276"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1277"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RenumRegs&#91;i&#93; = SavedRegs&#91;i&#93; - Countless - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1278"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1279"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Take the renumbered values and encode them into a 10-bit number.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1281"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t permutationEncoding = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1282"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegCount) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1283"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 6:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1284"><span class="doxyHighlight">      permutationEncoding |= 120 &#42; RenumRegs&#91;0&#93; + 24 &#42; RenumRegs&#91;1&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1285"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             + 6 &#42; RenumRegs&#91;2&#93; +  2 &#42; RenumRegs&#91;3&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1286"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             +     RenumRegs&#91;4&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 5:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><span class="doxyHighlight">      permutationEncoding |= 120 &#42; RenumRegs&#91;1&#93; + 24 &#42; RenumRegs&#91;2&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1290"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             + 6 &#42; RenumRegs&#91;3&#93; +  2 &#42; RenumRegs&#91;4&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             +     RenumRegs&#91;5&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1293"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 4:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1294"><span class="doxyHighlight">      permutationEncoding |=  60 &#42; RenumRegs&#91;2&#93; + 12 &#42; RenumRegs&#91;3&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1295"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             + 3 &#42; RenumRegs&#91;4&#93; +      RenumRegs&#91;5&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1296"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 3:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><span class="doxyHighlight">      permutationEncoding |=  20 &#42; RenumRegs&#91;3&#93; +  4 &#42; RenumRegs&#91;4&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             +     RenumRegs&#91;5&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1300"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1302"><span class="doxyHighlight">      permutationEncoding |=   5 &#42; RenumRegs&#91;4&#93; +      RenumRegs&#91;5&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1303"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1304"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1305"><span class="doxyHighlight">      permutationEncoding |=       RenumRegs&#91;5&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1306"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1307"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1308"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((permutationEncoding &amp; 0x3FF) == permutationEncoding &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1310"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid compact register encoding!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1311"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> permutationEncoding;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86asmbackend-cpp-/darwinx86asmbackend/#a89732d6378fdcd6c7580805844d42f33"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86asmbackend-cpp-/darwinx86asmbackend/#a89732d6378fdcd6c7580805844d42f33">DarwinX86AsmBackend</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> &amp;T, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregisterinfo">MCRegisterInfo</a> &amp;MRI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp;STI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86asmbackend-cpp-/x86asmbackend/#a51cfff6dff330a39d19c88e0ccd8abf1">X86AsmBackend</a>(T, STI), MRI(MRI), TT(STI.getTargetTriple()),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Is64Bit(TT.isArch64Bit()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memset(SavedRegs, 0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(SavedRegs));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OffsetSize = Is64Bit ? 8 : 4;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;MCObjectTargetWriter&gt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Implementation of algorithm to generate the compact unwind encoding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for the CFI instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86asmbackend-cpp-/darwinx86asmbackend/#a0423592792c76af41a0db8233e30bf45"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86asmbackend-cpp-/darwinx86asmbackend/#a0423592792c76af41a0db8233e30bf45">generateCompactUnwindEncoding</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarfframeinfo">MCDwarfFrameInfo</a> &#42;FI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &#42;Ctxt)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;MCCFIInstruction&gt;</a> Instrs = FI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarfframeinfo/#ad678a6927d2876e9eb5fba111da70584">Instructions</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Instrs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#ac835b8735b1b2faec0efdca236e37d94">empty</a>()) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcasmbackend/#a919e61fbc03b7b8a1660337897db7094">isDarwinCanonicalPersonality</a>(FI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarfframeinfo/#a3c371b9d29a2da49e836e29ac73b359b">Personality</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><span class="doxyHighlight">        !Ctxt-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext/#a7374fa80c820bab9544f60931b8ca408">emitCompactUnwindNonCanonical</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a525c66164a17a018715e2943f976b565">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reset the saved registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SavedRegIdx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memset(SavedRegs, 0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(SavedRegs));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasFP = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Encode that we are using EBP/RBP as the frame pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t CompactUnwindEncoding = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SubtractInstrIdx = Is64Bit ? 3 : 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstrOffset = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1353"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StackAdjust = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t StackSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t MinAbsOffset = std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;int64&#95;t&gt;::max();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1356"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccfiinstruction">MCCFIInstruction</a> &amp;Inst : Instrs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Inst.getOperation()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Any other CFI directives indicate a frame that we aren&#39;t prepared</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to represent via compact unwind, so just bail out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a525c66164a17a018715e2943f976b565">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccfiinstruction/#aaf905b9d7696f2b8da2e4c89c860f6eca238c64d5f2c2fea57085c0238948b04f">MCCFIInstruction::OpDefCfaRegister</a>: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Defines a frame pointer. E.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     movq %rsp, %rbp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1367"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  L0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     .cfi&#95;def&#95;cfa&#95;register %rbp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1369"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><span class="doxyHighlight">        HasFP = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the frame pointer is other than esp/rsp, we do not have a way to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generate a compact unwinding representation, so bail out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;MRI.getLLVMRegNum(Inst.getRegister(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) !=</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reset the counts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><span class="doxyHighlight">        memset(SavedRegs, 0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(SavedRegs));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><span class="doxyHighlight">        StackAdjust = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SavedRegIdx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MinAbsOffset = std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;int64&#95;t&gt;::max();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><span class="doxyHighlight">        InstrOffset += MoveInstrSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccfiinstruction/#aaf905b9d7696f2b8da2e4c89c860f6eca5822faf65b27795cd48bd44712d48927">MCCFIInstruction::OpDefCfaOffset</a>: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Defines a new offset for the CFA. E.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  With frame:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     pushq %rbp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  L0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     .cfi&#95;def&#95;cfa&#95;offset 16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  L0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     .cfi&#95;def&#95;cfa&#95;offset 80</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><span class="doxyHighlight">        StackSize = Inst.getOffset() / StackDivide;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccfiinstruction/#aaf905b9d7696f2b8da2e4c89c860f6eca74ec33979cec7221719caa137b50da3f">MCCFIInstruction::OpOffset</a>: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Defines a &quot;push&quot; of a callee-saved register. E.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     pushq %r15</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     pushq %r14</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     pushq %rbx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  L0:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     .cfi&#95;offset %rbx, -40</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     .cfi&#95;offset %r14, -32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     .cfi&#95;offset %r15, -24</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SavedRegIdx == CU&#95;NUM&#95;SAVED&#95;REGS)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are too many saved registers, we cannot use a compact</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unwind encoding.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a525c66164a17a018715e2943f976b565">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> Reg = &#42;MRI.getLLVMRegNum(Inst.getRegister(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SavedRegs&#91;SavedRegIdx++&#93; = Reg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><span class="doxyHighlight">        StackAdjust += OffsetSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MinAbsOffset = std::min(MinAbsOffset, std::abs(Inst.getOffset()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><span class="doxyHighlight">        InstrOffset += <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86asmbackend-cpp-/darwinx86asmbackend/#ad082921349ec650f4165036b1535993a">PushInstrSize</a>(Reg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StackAdjust /= StackDivide;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HasFP) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((StackAdjust &amp; 0xFF) != StackAdjust)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Offset was too big for a compact unwind encoding.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a525c66164a17a018715e2943f976b565">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We don&#39;t attempt to track a real StackAdjust, so if the saved registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// aren&#39;t adjacent to rbp we can&#39;t cope.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SavedRegIdx != 0 &amp;&amp; MinAbsOffset != 3 &#42; (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)OffsetSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a525c66164a17a018715e2943f976b565">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the encoding of the saved registers when we have a frame pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint32&#95;t RegEnc = encodeCompactUnwindRegistersWithFrame();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegEnc == ~0U) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a525c66164a17a018715e2943f976b565">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CompactUnwindEncoding |= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a6a430d800822edae2d2e36131395615d">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;BP&#95;FRAME</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CompactUnwindEncoding |= (StackAdjust &amp; 0xFF) &lt;&lt; 16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CompactUnwindEncoding |= RegEnc &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067af4ab9f398422d0b86cd487c6edd95736">CU::UNWIND&#95;BP&#95;FRAME&#95;REGISTERS</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SubtractInstrIdx += InstrOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++StackAdjust;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((StackSize &amp; 0xFF) == StackSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Frameless stack with a small stack size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CompactUnwindEncoding |= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067ad96614bec64aaa57a8bac8c6f07181d7">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;STACK&#95;IMMD</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Encode the stack size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CompactUnwindEncoding |= (StackSize &amp; 0xFF) &lt;&lt; 16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((StackAdjust &amp; 0x7) != StackAdjust)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The extra stack adjustments are too big for us to handle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a525c66164a17a018715e2943f976b565">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Frameless stack with an offset too large for us to encode compactly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CompactUnwindEncoding |= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067abc74b2c720b10e4cc1347bd310a930b4">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;STACK&#95;IND</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Encode the offset to the nnnnnn value in the &#39;subl $nnnnnn, ESP&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CompactUnwindEncoding |= (SubtractInstrIdx &amp; 0xFF) &lt;&lt; 16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Encode any extra stack adjustments (done via push instructions).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CompactUnwindEncoding |= (StackAdjust &amp; 0x7) &lt;&lt; 13;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Encode the number of registers saved. (Reverse the list first.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::reverse(&amp;SavedRegs&#91;0&#93;, &amp;SavedRegs&#91;SavedRegIdx&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CompactUnwindEncoding |= (SavedRegIdx &amp; 0x7) &lt;&lt; 10;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the encoding of the saved registers when we don&#39;t have a frame</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint32&#95;t RegEnc = encodeCompactUnwindRegistersWithoutFrame(SavedRegIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegEnc == ~0U) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a525c66164a17a018715e2943f976b565">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Encode the register encoding.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CompactUnwindEncoding |=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RegEnc &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a0d782a80c0c846892bebe03111c8372a">CU::UNWIND&#95;FRAMELESS&#95;STACK&#95;REG&#95;PERMUTATION</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CompactUnwindEncoding;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end anonymous namespace</span></CodeLine>
